frontmatter.title: Getting Started
frontmatter.description: The quick intro is meant to give developers a first guide through all the elementary parts of Eufemia.

frontmatter.title: Helpers
frontmatter.description: A couple of helper functions used inside of components and extensions.

frontmatter.title: Typography
frontmatter.description: DNB Headings and paragraphs, their properties and styling.

frontmatter.title: Accordion
frontmatter.description: The Accordion component, also known as a ComboBox, completes / suggests values during typing.

frontmatter.title: Autocomplete
frontmatter.description: The Autocomplete component, also know as a ComboBox, completes / suggests values during typing.

frontmatter.title: Avatar
frontmatter.description: The avatar component are identifiers that makes people and companies more scannable.

frontmatter.title: Badge
frontmatter.description: The badge component allows the user to focus on new or unread content or notifications.

frontmatter.title: Checkbox
frontmatter.description: The Checkbox component is shown as a square box that is ticked (checked) when activated.

frontmatter.title: DatePicker
frontmatter.description: The DatePicker component should be used whenever there is to enter a single date or a date period.

frontmatter.title: Dialog
frontmatter.description: The Dialog component is a Modal variation that appears at the center of the screen.

frontmatter.title: Drawer
frontmatter.description: The Drawer component is a Modal variation that appears as a side panel at any chosen side of the page.

frontmatter.title: Dropdown
frontmatter.description: The Dropdown component is a custom-made data selection component.

frontmatter.title: FormLabel
frontmatter.description: The FormLabel component represents a caption for all sorts of HTML elements in a user interface.

frontmatter.title: FormRow
frontmatter.description: The FormRow component is a helper to more easily achieve often used DNB form layout setups.

frontmatter.title: FormSet
frontmatter.description: The FormSet component is a helper to more easily achieve often used DNB form layout setups.

frontmatter.title: FormStatus (StatusMessage)
frontmatter.description: The FormStatus is a simple component meant for displaying the status of a form.

frontmatter.title: Fragments
frontmatter.description: Fragments are small, low-level and reusable parts used inside other components.

frontmatter.title: GlobalError (404)
frontmatter.description: The GlobalError is a simple component to integrate where a 404 or 500 message has to be shown.

frontmatter.title: GlobalStatus
frontmatter.description: The GlobalStatus is a complex component meant for displaying global Application notifications or a summary of a form.

frontmatter.title: Heading
frontmatter.description: The Heading component is a helper to create automated semantic headings within a boundary of some rules.

frontmatter.title: HeightAnimation
frontmatter.description: HeightAnimation is a helper component to animate from 0 to height:auto powered by CSS.

frontmatter.title: HelpButton
frontmatter.description: A help button with custom semantics, helping screen readers determine the meaning of that button.

frontmatter.title: Icon
frontmatter.description: The main Icon component is basically a wrapper for whatever icon you place within it.

frontmatter.title: InfoCard
frontmatter.description: The infocard is used to give the user more information than we can give in a messagebox. It can also be used as to give useful tips.

frontmatter.title: InputMasked
frontmatter.description: The InputMasked component uses the basic input component, but with some additional masking functionality.

frontmatter.title: Input
frontmatter.description: The input component is an umbrella component for all inputs which share the same style as the classic text input field.

frontmatter.title: Logo
frontmatter.description: A ready to use DNB logo in SVG format.

frontmatter.title: Modal
frontmatter.description: Modal dialogs appear on top of the main content changing the mode of the system into a special mode requiring user interaction.

frontmatter.title: NumberFormat
frontmatter.description: A ready to use DNB number formatter.

frontmatter.title: Pagination
frontmatter.description: The Pagination component supports both classical pagination and infinity scrolling.

frontmatter.title: ProgressIndicator
frontmatter.description: The ProgressIndicator component is a waiting loader / spinner to show while other content is in progression.

frontmatter.title: Radio
frontmatter.description: The Radio component is shown as a circle that is filled (checked) when activated.

frontmatter.title: Section
frontmatter.description: The Section component is a visual helper.

frontmatter.title: Skeleton
frontmatter.description: The Skeleton component is a visual building block helper.

frontmatter.title: Slider
frontmatter.description: The Slider component provides a visual indication of adjustable value.

frontmatter.title: Space
frontmatter.description: The Space component provides margins within the provided spacing patterns.

frontmatter.title: StepIndicator
frontmatter.description: The step indicator (progress indicator) is a visual representation of a users progress through a set of steps or series of actions.

frontmatter.title: Switch
frontmatter.description: The Switch component (toggle) is a digital on/off switch.

frontmatter.title: Table
frontmatter.description: Enhanced HTML Table element.

frontmatter.title: Tabs
frontmatter.description: Tabs are a set of buttons which allow navigation between content that is related and on the same level of hierarchy.

frontmatter.title: Tag
frontmatter.description: The Tag component is a compact element for displaying discrete information.

frontmatter.title: Textarea
frontmatter.description: The Textarea component has to be used as a multi-line text input control with an unlimited number of characters possible.

frontmatter.title: Timeline
frontmatter.description: The Timeline component shows events in chronological order and gives a great overview of the overall process.

frontmatter.title: ToggleButton
frontmatter.description: The ToggleButton component should be used to toggle on or off a limited number of choices.

frontmatter.title: Tooltip
frontmatter.description: The Tooltip component is primarily meant to enhance the UX for various and additional information.

frontmatter.title: Upload
frontmatter.description: The Upload widget should be used in scenarios where the user has to upload files. Files can be uploaded by clicking button. You also have the opportunity to add descriptive texts below the title where you could put max file size, allowed fileformats etc.

frontmatter.title: VisuallyHidden
frontmatter.description: VisuallyHidden has all the styles necessary to hide it from visual clients, but keep it for screen readers.

frontmatter.title: PaymentCard
frontmatter.description: The PaymentCard component is a dynamic defined visual component imitate a physical payment card.

frontmatter.title: Demos
frontmatter.description: The purpose of having Eufemia Demos is that you as a developer can see the code and understand Eufemia and be inspired and give you a good start.

frontmatter.title: Living system
frontmatter.description: Eufemia is DNBs design system. It is constantly evolving and improving and is our single source of truth for UI design and front end code.

frontmatter.title: Maintainability
frontmatter.description: The hard part of a living design system, like Eufemia, is not to create black holes and choosing ways to make maintainability hard and complex.

frontmatter.title: Requirements
frontmatter.description: Eufemia can be used within an UMD, ES5, ES6 or TypeScript environment. The purpose is to use it on top (or inside) of modern JavaScript frontend framework and setups.

frontmatter.title: Customization
frontmatter.description: Customization and tools is a section dedicated to how to use and customize Eufemia in various situations.

frontmatter.title: Button
frontmatter.description: The Button component should be used as the primary call-to-action in a form, or as a user interaction mechanism.

frontmatter.title: Breadcrumb
frontmatter.description: The Breadcrumb component is a bar for navigation showing current web path.

frontmatter.title: DrawerList
frontmatter.description: The DrawerList component is a fragment inside other components.

frontmatter.title: ScrollView
frontmatter.description: ScrollView is a tiny helper component helping the user controlling overflowing content horizontally or vertically

frontmatter.title: InfinityScroller
frontmatter.description: The InfinityScroller component is a mode of the Pagination component which loads content continuously as the user scrolls down the page.

frontmatter.title: Checklist
frontmatter.description: Accessibility checklist to help you remember the most important tasks you have to follow during front end development.

frontmatter.title: Focus
frontmatter.description: Accessibility helpers to handle focus management and Skip Link usage.

frontmatter.title: Best Practices for JavaScript and JSX
CSS Styles
frontmatter.description: To ensure flexibility and the possibility of theming, the DNB CSS Styles area built as flexible packages you can import and combine.

frontmatter.title: ESM / SSR
frontmatter.description: Eufemia uses ESM as their default module format. More info on this topic below.
